description: This file is a BitBake recipe fragment for the 'binutils' package, defining build instructions, dependencies, configuration options, packaging files, and related variables for building GNU Binutils in an embedded Linux build environment.

classes.name: multilib_header
classes.description: Inheritance to handle multilib header files

classes.name: update-alternatives
classes.description: Inheritance to handle alternative system management

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures the build environment, runs gnu-configize, and invokes autotools configuration with custom options.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Performs installation steps, cleans up unnecessary files, creates symlinks, and installs headers and static libraries.
